name: Son of Dathomir
description:
A fan game about Darth Maul's early childhood and going into apprenticeship with Sidious. Fairly short with most of the emphasis on dialogue and visuals. Fusion of some canon and legends lore with my own spin on it.  I might expand it later to go deeper into his life but for now this was already pretty heavy.

Content warnings: child abuse, general family turmoil... it's Darth Maul...

I don't own Star Wars or Darth Maul obviously! Names + characters + music does not belong to me but all art is original + some RPG Maker 2000 sfx.

(Feel free to use this as fan fiction inspiration!)

Controls: Arrow keys to move, space or enter to interact, escape to open menu to shut down (you won't need to manage inventory or anything like that)
